original_text: And Jesus went forth, and saw a great multitude, and was moved with compassion toward them, and he healed their sick.
korean_text: 예수께서 나오사 큰 무리를 보시고 불쌍히 여기사 그 중에 있는 병자를 고쳐 주시니라

sentences.original_text: and was moved with compassion toward them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 향한 불쌍히 여기는 마음으로 감동하셨으며
